SIGHT_MAIN_DESC_1:
*🔥 100% Anonymity* - You specify, we monitor

*🔥 No holidays or weekends* - We keep in *sight* 24/7
INSTA_MAIN_DESC_1:
*Instagram features:*

*▪️ Stories* 📱 - Automatically download user stories

*▪️ Followers* 👥 - Keep track of user interactions

*▪️ Likes* ❤️‍🔥 - Monitor who likes what

INSTA_STOR_DESC_11:
*Stories Service* tip

*Buttons:*
*▪️ @sight_service_bot 👤* - View downloaded stories

*▪️ Remove ✖️* - Remove target from list

*▪️ New Target 👤* - Start tracking user stories
INSTA_STOR_DESC_12:
*How often should we check? 🕒*

*Price List* _(price per week)_:

😴 Every *15 minutes* - *5* 💎
🫣 Every *5 minutes* - *10* 💎
✨ Every *1 minute* - *50* 💎 _(okay)_
🤫 Every *30 seconds* - *100* 💎
⚡ Every *10 seconds* - *300* 💎 _(best)_

Choose with buttons 👇
